1.text: Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:

2.text: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

3.text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,

13.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
